bug.description: The label coordinates in JSON range is from (0,0) to (maximum, maximum), but i it should be (0,0) to (MAX-1,MAX-1) in normal. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38305618/50270963-31354880-046e-11e9-8ad3-d9e959d38352.png></denchmark-link>
